import React, { Component } from 'react' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import ButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup' import ButtonToolbar from 'react-bootstrap/ButtonToolbar' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import rImg from '../Images/Rohith.JPG'; import AbstractModal from './AbstractModal'; import './LoginForm.css' export class ResearchCard extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.modalRef=React.createRef(); } openAbstractModal=()=>{ this.modalRef.current.openAbstractModal(); } render() { return ( <>
{this.props.details.author}
27 April at 17:44
{this.props.details.title} {this.props.details.status} View
{this.props.details.abstract} Read More
) } } export default ResearchCard
